pageDescrip: CMS Page Editor - be careful editing the CMS using the CMS! Changes take immediate effect.

attributes.title: Commit and Push Staged or Changed files
attributes.prompt: Please provide a comment to describe the changes.

attributes.title: Stash Staged or Changed files
attributes.prompt: Stashes the changes so that you can work on something else, and then come back later and re-apply the changes.

attributes.title: Rename / Move File
attributes.prompt: Please enter the new file name:

attributes.title: New File
attributes.prompt: Please enter the new file name:

attributes.title: New Folder
attributes.prompt: Please enter the new folder name:

attributes.title: Upload Files
attributes.prompt4: Existing files in the workspace will be overwritten by any uploaded files with the same name.

attributes.text: Set Workspace
You might want to save any unsaved changes first.
Switch Branch
The workspace branches are:
New Branch
Select an existing branch to create the new branch off of.

validationRules.errorMsg: Creating a branch off of master is not allowed.

attributes.text: Enter the new branch name. Include your name. e.g. chris_fix_quote_form
Merge Branch
Select a branch to merge into the current branch.
Checkout Branch
Select a branch to checkout or pull from the repository:
Delete Branch
Select the branch to delete from the Workspace:

validationRules.errorMsg: Please select a branch to delete.

attributes.text: Check the checkbox to also delete the branch from the Repository:
Commit Log
Rebase
Incorporates changes from the repository that are not in the workspace current branch.
The following changes are in repository develop branch but not in the workspace current branch.
Click on the Rebase button to merge the develop branch changes into the current branch.
Pull
Incorporates changes from the repository that are not in the workspace current branch.
The following changes are in the repository but not in the workspace current branch.
Click on the Pull Changes button to merge the repository changes into the current branch.
